name: Avenir Technologies DBA Visara International
tag_list: services, software-development, outsourcing-solutions, web-based-development, web-2-0, application-development, web-development, social-networking
overview: Avenir Technologies, Inc., doing business as Visara International, designs and manufactures information solutions and systems for businesses. Its products include front end processors; network and systems management solutions; consoles and servers, such as concentrators, console concentrators, communications servers, communications controllers, and console consolidation systems; console management products, including master console centers; network integration solutions and console platform appliances; printers, including serial and line matrix, and laser; and console consolidation products for mainframe and midrange applications. The company also offers various software products, such as security appliances; eManager, a network management program that is designed for Visara thin-client desktop devices and communication servers; and enterprise management systems. It delivers products and services through a direct and indirect sales network. Avenir Technologies, Inc. was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Morrisville, North Carolina with additional offices throughout North America
